description.title: Craft Pattern Design
description:
If you would like to craft something special as a gift or for your home but don't know how to go about designing a pattern, I am the nerd for you!

I have the software and years of crafting know-how t…

abstrac: Helping brighten your home with customized plastic canvas craft patterns!
bio:
I am a recent transplant to Iowa from North Dakota.  After leaving a soul-crushing Human Resources job, I decided to follow my passion for crafting and start an Etsy store.  

My favorite part of the job is turning ideas into custom patterns, so I thought I would offer that service directly!

If you have something ranging from a vague idea to a specific type of item you just can't find a pattern for, contact me!  I would love to help make your craft idea a reality.
I am a stay-at-home dog mom and homesteader in training, so I work 8-5 as puppy craziness allows.  During crunches I can work evenings if need be.  My preferred communication is email.

abstrac: Words for today...Words for the ages...
bio: I'm an award winning published author who works strictly at writing novels, narrative nonfiction and memoirs. From years of writing prose and a dedication to the most exquisite literary standards, I have become a master at creating and maintain a gripping narrative from start to finish and bring those skills to bear on every project.I am diligent, imaginative and meticulous to a fault. I meet and exceed my own deadlines. My work is always polished and proofread. Per my moniker, you will be dealing with me and no one else. Writing is my business, my only business.This is my guarantee to every new client. I will fashion your book into an enduring piece of literature, worthy of publication. I will write you a synopsis and query letter and assist you in finding representation. As a pro in the industry, with a body of literature that commands respect from literary agents and book editors alike, why settle for anything less?

I offer three complete drafts and revisions with each project, the particulars of which you will find in my proposal.My financial terms are as follows:20% good faith deposit and release of funds, an additional 55% at completion of first draft, paid in increments of 10,000 words, 15% at completion of second draft and 10% at completion of third draft. Being sensitive to the possibility of unanticipated hardship on the part of my clients, or simply a desire to suspend a project for personal reasons, I do not require that my entire fee be placed in an escrow account at the start of a project. The above stated financial arrangements will ensure that I am paid fairly at each stage, and that you will have received a fair return for your investment, the same.
